name: Party Animal (Alex Carlson, Space Duckie  Niko, Thrasher08)
name_original: Party Animal (Alex Carlson, Space Duckie  Niko, Thrasher08)
description:
Keeping things clean seems easy, until night that is. When the sun sets and the moon rises, the inner party animal is unleashed and won't stop trashing everything!

There's no cure for headbanging, keep your house clean before you parents come home to visit! The battle of cleanliness and anarchy begins now

Clean up after last night's partying self

Made by Alex, Thrasher08 (twitter), Blaaanky, and Zack

---------------NOTES------------------------

End sequence is currently broken on reaching day 0
